contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 6th day of January, 1999, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, the decision of the Superior Court is REVERSED, and the matter is REMANDED to the trial court for proceedings consistent with Shick v. Shirey, 552 Pa. 590, 716 A.2d 1231 (1998).
